name: Dazzler
overview: A maze/platform game made in 1982 by Century Electronics. The game Features voice simulation and is kind of a cross between pac-man and donkey kong jr. Keep feeding your gorilla friend bananas and he'll tell you what to do with the vultures. Drop snakes to delay the vultures so you can feed him bananas. Once you feed him all bananas he needed, you are safe from the vultures. After completing all 8 levels, an ending cutscene is shown.
